p.p: Indicates the separators to be used when formatting amounts for input/display purposes
Enquiries, Repgens & screen input/display

desc.p: Validation rules

p.p: 2 Alphanumeric character
Decimal separater can be comma or full stop
Same character cannot be used

desc.p: Multi-value defining the actions to be performed when committing a record. Valid values are :-

p.p: Blank – normal commit processing.
“CONFIRM” – General override to be raised confirming committal of the contract whilst displaying the contract in See mode (using either the same VERSION or an alternative VERSION record).
“PASSWORD” – User’s password must be supplied for successful committal.
“ONE.TIME.PASSWORD” – A one-time password must be supplied for successful committal.
“MEMORABLE.DATA” - User’s memorable data must be supplied for successful committal.

desc.p: Attributes to enable / disable the contract features:

p.p: MULTI.VERSION.HEADERS – enables version multi-line version headers to be displayed.
NO.AUTO.LAUNCHES – restricts auto launch of enquiries.
NO.CALENDAR - Hides the calendar icon for date type fields.
NO.CHECKFILE.ENRICHMENT – turns off the check file enrichment feature.
NO.CONTEXT.ENQUIRIES – disables the context enquiries.
NO.DROPDOWNS – disable the dropdown feature.
NO.HEADER.TAB - won’t display the contract header.
NO.HOT.FIELDS – disable the hot fields functionality.
NO.WEB.VALIDATION.FIELDS – disable the web validation.

desc.p: Description of profile used by External user is defined in this field.
Validation rules
Standard T24 language field.
Wild card characters that will be used by processing enquiry

p.p: *,% could be defined

desc.p: Attributes to enable / disable the enquiry features:

p.p: NO.SELECTION - restricts enquiry selection screen embeeded on enquiry response window.
ALL.DATA - to display all the selected records.
NO.COLUMN.HEADER – restricts the column header being displayed on the enquiry results.window.
NO.TOOLBAR – to disable the enquiry toolbar display.
ZERORECORD.DISPLAY – blank screen will be displayed when no records are selected.

desc.p: A generic type field specifying the type of flow being defined. Values allowed are :

p.p: “FIRST.LOGIN” - action to be performed when a new user logs in for the very first time.
“EVERY.LOGIN” – action to be performed when a user logs in.
“INITIAL.SCREEN” – initial composite screen to be displayed after a user logs in.
“POST.COMMIT” – action to be performed following a successful commit.
“LOGOUT” - action to be performed when a user logs out.

desc.p: A generic value field specifying what to display at this point in the workflow. This should either be a EB.COMPOSITE.SCREEN record Id or a URL to a static page.
Key to CHANNEL.PRODUCT.ACCESS can be defined here. Standard multi-value field.
Key to CHANNEL.PROTECTION.LIMIT can be defined here. Standard multi-value field.
External user skin to be specified in this field.
Validation Rules
20 Alphanumeric characters.

The USER rights can be generically defined for more than one user through a USER.SMS.GROUP. The ID of the USER.SMS.GROUP record can be provided here and the restrictions defined there will be followed.
Attributes to turn off the system level features:

p.p: NO.AUTOCOMPLETE - disable the IE’s auto complete feature.
SIMPLE.INTERFACE - turns off all the above mentioned contract and enquiry features.

desc.p: Display of Tool style could be specified:

p.p: TEXT - indicates the tools to be displayed as text.
IMAGE – Indicates the tools to be displayed as images.
TEXT.IMAGE – Indicates both text and image could be displayed on tools.
